itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by heavy metal singer Tommy Vext to break down the latest news including the continuing border crisis and Kamala’s terrible trip to Guatemala, Jeff Bezos’ plan to fly into outer space, and the US government’s concerns that America’s enemies are using energy weapons on American government officials.

 

Go to ghostbed.com/drinkinbros and use code DRINKINBROS for 30% off EVERYTHING (Mattresses, Adjustable Base, and more) -- plus a 101 Night Sleep Trial and Mattresses Made in the USA!

 

Go to CardoMax.com and use promo code DB, and you get Buy One Get One FREE on your first order.

 

Go to BuyRaycon.com/drinkinbros for 15% off your order.
